thread.title: St.Clair and Pacific Symphony do right by Schumann and Brahms
thread.title_full: St.Clair and Pacific Symphony do right by Schumann and Brahms

author: TIMOTHY MANGAN
title: St.Clair and Pacific Symphony do right by Schumann and Brahms
text: St.Clair and Pacific Symphony do right by Schumann and Brahms Oct. 23, 2015 Updated 11:17 a.m. 1 of 7 Carl St.Clair conducts the Pacific Symphony on Thursday night at Segerstrom Concert Hall. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 7 David Fray and the Pacific Symphony perform Schumann's Piano Concerto in A minor at Segerstrom Concert Hall on Thursday night. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 7 David Fray performs Schumann's Piano Concerto in A minor at the Segerstrom Concert Hall on Thursday night. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 7 David Fray and the Pacific Symphony perform Schumann's Piano Concerto in A minor under the direction of Carl St.Clair on Thursday evening. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 7 David Fray and the Pacific Symphony perform Schumann's Piano Concerto in A minor at Segerstrom Concert Hall on Thursday night. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 7 David Fray performs Schumann's Piano Concerto in A minor at Segerstrom Concert Hall on Thursday night. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 7 From left, Carl St.Clair and David Fray bow after their performance of Schumann's Piano Concerto in A minor at the Segerstrom Concert Hall on Thursday night. DREW A. KELLEY , CONTRIBUTING PHOTOGRAPHER
